As for my intention, I'm hoping that by being kind and giving her some money upfront, we can establish a positive dynamic that will make the rest of the experiment more enjoyable for both of us. I want to show her that I'm someone who is willing to take risks and be generous, which might just help us build a strong connection.

As for my intention, I want to give her enough money so that she feels appreciated and valued. Not too much, not too little - just the right amount to show that I care about what she wants to achieve in this experiment.
